 2018-03992018-04-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
Radiation Emitting Devices Act
Controlled Drugs and Substances Act
Canada Consumer Product Safety Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Health Regulations (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH REGULATIONS (Miscellaneous Program) in order to (1) correct discrepancies between the French and English versions; (2) correct typographical or grammatical errors; (3) modernize obsolete references and archaic language; and (4) add clarity to regulatory provisions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0069 Publication Date: 2018-04-18
AttachmentsAttachment
